LURP Utility Suite – Full Changelog
===================================

Version 1.2.0
-------------
• Added fully redesigned System Info page
    - Live CPU usage graph
    - Live RAM usage graph
    - Live GPU usage graph (GPUtil support)
    - Disk usage display
• Rewrote Troubleshooter page with only non-duplicate tools
    - DNS Flush
    - Network Stack Reset
    - IP Renew
    - Process Killers (FiveM & Steam)
    - Restart Windows Explorer
    - Clean, stable log system
• Rebuilt Cleaning page from the ground up
    - Accurate cache size detection
    - FiveM Cache Cleaner
    - FiveM Log Cleaner
    - GTA Shader Cache Cleaner
    - Windows Temp Folder Cleaner
    - “Clean All” button
    - Rescan button
    - Live cleaning log
• Rewrote Quick Tools page
    - Folder shortcuts (FiveM folder, Logs, Temp)
    - Launch FiveM / Launch Steam
    - Open LURP Discord
    - Open Itch.io page
    - Non-duplicate tools only
• Added crash-proof Changelog system (local file instead of web request)
• Updated UI layout and spacing across all pages
• Improved sidebar responsiveness and styling
• Fixed app closing instantly after splash
• Reduced thread warnings and removed unsafe thread UI operations
• Cleaner, more stable card layout for all tools & actions
• General performance improvements and code cleanup
